remarks: Lemma for strong set of CH states theorem: the function ` S ` , that maps a closed subspace to the square of the norm of its projection onto a unit vector, is a state.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hstrlem3a.1 $e |- S = ( x e. CH |-> ( ( projh ` x ) ` u ) ) $.
hstrlem3a $p |- ( ( u e. ~H /\ ( normh ` u ) = 1 ) -> S e. CHStates ) $.
$d u x $.
